bibl.title: Joseph Deveriske v. Territory of Washington. Habeas Corpus
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court of the Territory of Washington

body.p: In the District Court in and for the County of Spokane, Territory of Washington Habeas Corpus } In the matter of the } Writ. application of Batty Deveriske for said writ.
To Joseph Warren Chief of Police of said the City of Spokane Falls.

Whereas application was this day made by Batty Deveriske is by you this day unlawfully and by pretense detained and restrained of his liberty and asking that said Joseph Deveriske may be brought before this Honorable Court and the cause of said alleged illegal detention and restraint enquired into.

Now therefore you are commanded to have said Joseph Deverike before me, the Judge of said Court in my chambers in Hyde Block at 10 o'clock on the 20th day of April 1888, and there receive what shall be ordered concerning said Joseph Deveriske and have them and there this writ.
Given under my hand and the seal of this Court this 19th day of April 1888
District Court County of Spokane Territory of Washington No.2167 Habeas Corpus Joseph Deveriske
